title: Merlin Bird ID
author: twitchard
aiHeadline: Birdwatchers rejoice! Merlin Bird ID app finally gives you a reason to stare at trees like a crazy person.

title: FFmpeg merges WebRTC support
author: Sean-Der
aiHeadline: FFmpeg adds WebRTC support, because who doesn't want their video calls to look like they're straight out of a 90s webcam?

title: IRS Direct File on GitHub
author: nickthegreek
aiHeadline: IRS finally joins the 21st century by putting tax forms on GitHub, because who needs privacy when you can have version control?

title: After court order, OpenAI is now preserving all ChatGPT user logs
author: ColinWright
aiHeadline: OpenAI now preserving all ChatGPT logs, because nothing says 'trust us' like keeping a permanent record of every dumb thing you say.

title: Why I wrote the BEAM book
author: lawik
aiHeadline: Author explains why they wrote the BEAM book, probably because talking to people is way too hard and this was easier than therapy.
